europeana:record.dc:title: The type locality of Eoperipatus sumatranus (Sedgwick, 1888), with biographical notes on its collector W.J.E. Hekmeijer
Zoologische Bijdragen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Lande, van der V.M.
Holthuis L.B.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Zo√∂logie: algemeen
Onychophora; Eoperipatus sumatranus; type locality; biography; W.J.E. Hek- meijer.
europeana:record.dc:description: Acquisition records of the type material and biographical data of its collector make it likely that the type locality of Eoperipatus sumatranus (Sedgwick) is Mt. Arjuno, E. Java, and not E. Sumatra. Biographical data for W.J.E. Hekmeijer and some of his closest relatives are given.
